title: Google Maps Typewriter Machine...
content:
Hi colleagues,

The Google Maps Typewriter Machine is a new typographic inline tool...

[http://www2.ub.edu/cursusductus/femfum/maps.google.cat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016203508/http:/www2.ub.edu/cursusductus/femfum/maps.google.cat/ "http://www2.ub.edu/cursusductus/femfum/maps.google.cat/")

...an Open Source cloud app. experiment for all alphabets :-)

Enjoy and kind regards,
author: marcantoni
